item.title: aws-cloud-developement-kit
item.description: manual in console scripted via aws-cli or aws-sdk declarative JSON/YAML via cloudformation document-obj-model (DOM) via troposphere componentized via aws-cdk mermaid.initialize({startOnLoad:true,'theme':'dark'}); graph LR A["constructs in stack written in python code"] -- B["cdk-cli compilation"] -- C["cloudformation deployment"]
item.content:
1. manual in console
  2. scripted via aws-cli or aws-sdk
  3. declarative JSON/YAML via cloudformation
  4. document-obj-model (DOM) via troposphere
  5. componentized via aws-cdk
graph LR A["constructs in stack written in python code"] --> B["cdk-cli compilation"] --> C["cloudformation deployment"]
